Captain.Title: Lovok
Captain.Ability: During the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. Lovok may field the "Tal Shiar" [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade.

Captain.Title: Matt Decker
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 of your ship (including your ship). Target ship gains +1 attack die this round and suffers 1 damage to its Hull.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 of your ship (including your ship). Target ship gains +1 attack die this round and suffers 1 damage to its Hull.
